title: WeWork Will Close About 40 Locations as Losses Narrow
description: The co-working company said revenue rose more than 20 percent in the most recent quarter, but it tempered its forecast for the full year.
dc:creator: Peter Eavis
media:credit: Michael Noble Jr. for The New York Times
media:description: WeWork said it lost $568 million in the third quarter, an improvement from last year.
